column1: Comedian : Why did the police stop you?
Hero     : Oh! it is not the first time that a police is behind a thief
Comedian : Oh god! did they find the necklace?
Comedian : So all our hard work is of no use right?
Hero     : I asked you to go behind a girl no?
Comedian : Who? That skinny girl? I'm not interested. followed her for some time and I came back
Hero     : I slipped the necklace inside her bag to escape from the police
Comedian : Oh no! She left in a taxi
Hero     : Oh no by taxi? Is it an airport taxi?
Hero     : Then we shall go to that counter and ask where she has gone
